amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provisions of the bill and replace it with a study and report by the Comptroller General of the United States. The study and report would have been on those agencies that have lengthened the employee probationary period from 1 to 2 years, and any impact of an existing 2-year probationary period at the agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-430 to strike the provisions of the bill and replaces it with a study and report by the Comptroller General of the United States. The study and report will be on those agencies that have lengthened the employee probationary period from 1 to 2 years, and any impact of an existing 2 year probationary period at the agency.
